data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Goniusa Casey, 1906 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gusarov, Vladimir I. (2003): A revision of the genus Goniusa Casey, 1906 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 164: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156407
